localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: This extension attempts to recover your suspended Great Suspender tabs by searching your browser history and displaying any found suspended tabs. You can then: - adjust grouping, sorting and detail - save as folders and bookmarks - copy URLs to the clipboard
blogPost.body: This extension attempts to recover your suspended Great Suspender tabs by searching your browser history and displaying any found suspended tabs. You can then: - adjust grouping, sorting and detail - save as folders and bookmarks - copy URLs to the clipboard
blogPost.title: The Great Suspender Recovery Tool - Recover your lost Great Suspender tabs
blogPost.author: Dave Stewart

localize.description: 该扩展程序通过搜索您的浏览器历史记录并显示任何发现的暂停标签，试图恢复您暂停的Great Suspender标签。然后您可以 - 调整分组、排序和细节 - 保存为文件夹和书签 - 将URL复制到剪贴板上
localize.tagline: 恢复您丢失的Great Suspender tabs

localize.description: 該擴展程序通過搜索您的瀏覽器歷史記錄並顯示任何發現的暫停標籤，試圖恢復您暫停的Great Suspender標籤。然後您可以 - 調整分組、排序和細節 - 保存爲文件夾和書籤 - 將URL複製到剪貼板上
localize.tagline: 恢復您丟失的Great Suspender tabs

previous.excerpt: Clubhouse Clone code built on React Native with Backend and Custom Microservices Architecture for Audio Conference which is Capable of Creating Truly Huge Rooms for Thousands of Listeners
previous.title: Clubrooms - Clubhouse clone for Android and iOS

localize.description: 基于React Native构建的Clubhouse Clone代码，带有后端和自定义微服务架构的音频会议，能够为数千名听众创建真正的巨大房间。
基於React Native構建的Clubhouse Clone代碼，帶有後端和自定義微服務架構的音頻會議，能夠爲數千名聽衆創建真正的巨大房間。

next.excerpt: Generate high quality tweets for the lazy weekends when you're out of tweet ideas. Jokes, Quotes, shower thoughts, facts and LPTs, all for free🔥 Comes with inbuilt button to fire up a canva canvas and tweet beautiful graphics fast! Enjoy!
next.title: Tweet Ideas - Never run out of tweets again with this content generator

localize.description: 在懒散的周末，当你没有了推文创意时，生成高质量的推文。笑话、名言、想法、事实和LPTs，全部免费🔥内嵌按钮，启动canva画布，快速生成漂亮的图文。享受吧
localize.tagline: 有了这个内容生成器，永远不会再没有推文了。
